import React, { useState } from 'react'; import './LoginForm.css'; const WikipediaLoginPage = () => { const [formData, setFormData] = useState({ username: '', password: '' }); const [remember, setRemember] = useState(false); // Opciones de apariencia const [textSize, setTextSize] = useState('estandar'); const [width, setWidth] = useState('estandar'); const [color, setColor] = useState('claro'); const handleChange = (e) => { const { name, value } = e.target; setFormData(prev => ({ ...prev, [name]: value })); }; const handleSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); alert('¡Bienvenido a Wikipedia!'); }; return (
